6.23.16  7:07 am   Do you think of ideas as members of a massive, ever-growing backlog that threatens to crush us all with the impossible task of bringing everything to fruition? I did, and it made me really stressed out. It might be helpful to think of them as an infinite stream of creativity, flowing from and to nothing, and you can grab an idea from it and finish that one, and let the others pass through, since new ones always keep flowing in. I did that, and now I'm a little bit lazier, but a whole lot less stressed out, so I think it evens out.

6.22.16  9:30 pm   What do you think about musical leitmotifs? I've seen a decent amount of people who have heated opinions against them. But, I think if they are integrated into other storytelling media, they work well. For example, the video game " Undertale " is really good at using leitmotifs to expand its themes.
6.22.16  9:15 pm   It's so cool you are answering this questions! So, what's the origin / inspiration for "I like"? And what about that cheeky first part?
